Foreign Diplomats Visit Combined Food-Processing Factory
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Combined Food-Processing Factory 
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here visited the combined food-processing factory managed by Ri Jong Nam Tuesday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the DPRK.
 They were briefed on the fact that the employees of the factory and builders have successfully built up the combined food-processing centre to win the admiration of the generations to come as required by the new century under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. Then they went round various production processes.
 Syrian Charge d'Affaires A.I. Muhammad Adib Alhani wrote in the visitor's book that the visit to the factory provided an important occasion to see the successes achieved by the Korean people. He sincerely hoped that the factory making progress under the care of Kim Jong Il would register great achievements and the friendly and cooperative relations between Syria and the DPRK grow stronger.

Greetings to Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Brazilian FM
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Brazilian counterpart Celso Luis Nunes Amorim on the occasion of its independence day.
 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and two ministries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Pakistani Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Noorullah Khan, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 On hand were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and a staff member of the Pakistani embassy here.    
 After receiving the credentials the president had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets South African Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets South African Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with outgoing South African Ambassador to the DPRK Themba Kubheka at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 Present there were Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of sympathy to Indonesian President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono today in connection with an airliner crash in the air above Medan, North Sumatra of Indonesia, that claimed big human and property losses.
 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the Indonesian president, government and people.
